courseSection0.text1: LIN4105 - History of the English Language (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Earn at least 9 credits from the following: 
LIN4660 - Linguistics and Literature (3)
LIN4801 - Language and Meaning (3)
LIN5137 - Linguistics (3)
ANT3610 - Language and Culture (3)
PHI4400 - Philosophy of Science (3)
PHI4221 - Philosophy of Language (3)
SPA3112C - Basic Phonetics (4)
courseSection1.text1: Or any course approved by the Linguistics Committee Credit Hours: 3

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 9 hours used in the minor must: At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

Other Requirements

A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
At least 9 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
